description:
If you thought my first course was amazing, wait til you see how I "BRING IT" in this course! This is the follow up course to How I made $100k my first year selling on Ebay.

Special Promo Price THIS MONTH only! The price will increase by $10 on July 1st 2016!

No long sales letter here, this course is FOR YOU if you are a student of my 1st course and you are ready to scale your business and take it to the next level by outsourcing! I will walk you through the whole process and even help train your V.A. (Employee) for you too!

If you don't think you or your business is worth the investment, then simple; don't make the investment and don't take the course. Thousands of students have messaged me that paid a promo price on the first course say that after they completed it they would have gladly paid full price for it and even feel bad paying a discounted price because of the VALUE. This is a private course for the BEST students from my first course. Students of this course will have my full undivided extra attention :)
title: How to Train your Virtual Assistant for eBay Drop Shipping
